Class Raytracer.SceneObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • Raytracer.JSONSerializable
      • Raytracer.SceneObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Raytracer.Tweakable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Raytracer.Plane, Raytracer.Sphere
    Enclosing class:
    Raytracer

    abstract class Raytracer.SceneObject
extends Raytracer.JSONSerializable
implements Raytracer.Tweakable
    Represents any solid object or surface that can be hit by a ray.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Raytracer.Vector3 albedo
      The amount of light reflect by this object, in each component of RGB.
      java.lang.String name
      The name of this object, as displayed in the dropdown list.

      • rayIntersect

        public abstract float rayIntersect​(Raytracer.Ray ray)
        Determines if and where the given ray intersects this object. Will return a value <= 0 if ray does not intersect this object.
        Parameters:
        ray - the ray to be tested for intersection.
        Returns:
        the value of t at which the ray hits this object.

      • getNormal

        public abstract Raytracer.Vector3 getNormal​(Raytracer.Vector3 point)
        Get the normal vector to the surface at the given point.
        Parameters:
        point - the point in 3D space at which to get the normal vector.
        Returns:
        the normal vector to the surface at the point.
